meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grammatical.
meanings.sent1: Understanding grammaticalities is important for clear communication.
meanings.sent2: Teachers often focus on teaching students about grammaticalities in writing.
meanings.sent3: The students' playfully incorrect use of grammaticalities made the class laugh.
meanings.sent4: In the world of language, grammaticalities are the building blocks of effective communication.
meanings.sent5: Her attention to grammaticalities in her speech made her a persuasive speaker.

meanings.sent1: Learning the grammaticalities of a new language can be challenging.
